function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Healthcare costs omitted for services not related to illness treatment, such as contraceptive management and other circumstances","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of total healthcare costs and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Include all healthcare costs in the analysis to provide a comprehensive assessment of resource utilization","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Healthcare administrators, policymakers","Owner":"Healthcare researchers, data analysts"},{"Description":"Sickness benefit transfers not accounted for in the analysis","Impact":"Underestimation of the economic impact of long-term absences due to illness","Mitigation":"Include sickness benefit transfers in the analysis to capture the full economic impact of long-term absences","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Economic analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Economic research team"},{"Description":"Conversion of costs to international dollars using an online conversion tool","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in the international comparison of healthcare costs","Mitigation":"Verify the accuracy of the conversion tool and consider alternative methods for international cost comparison","Technologies":"Online currency conversion tool, alternative cost comparison methods","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
